hero.title: “Turkmentravel  Expo -2026”  International Exhibition
hero.description: 'Turkmen Travel' is an international exhibition dedicated to the development of tourism in Turkmenistan, held in Ashgabat. It brings together travel agencies, hotels, airlines, and tour operators from around the world to present tourist destinations, develop partnerships, and promote the country’s cultural and natural attractions.

cards.title: Travel Agencies & Tour Operators
cards.description: To promote their tours, advertise new routes, establish partnerships, and participate in international tourism projects (including Silk Road, Cultural Tourism, Agro Tourism).

cards.title: Airlines and Transport Providers
cards.description: To promote services, expand flight networks, and build partnerships with tour operators and government institutions.

cards.title: Hotels, Resorts, and Wellness Centers
cards.description: To present accommodation services, wellness programs, health retreats, and attract tourism companies.

cards.title: Restaurants, Food Producers, and Gastro Brands
cards.description: To participate in the Food Expo, showcase national cuisine, gastronomic tours, and local products.

cards.title: Cultural Centers, Museums, and Craft Masters
cards.description: For promoting cultural heritage, souvenir products, handicrafts, and traditional arts.

cards.title: Educational Institutions
cards.description: Universities, colleges, and training centers promoting educational tourism and attracting international students.

cards.title: Why visit?
description: Discover new destinations and routes across Turkmenistan, Central Asia, and the Silk Road region.
Meet reliable partners — airlines, hotels, tour operators, wellness centers, and education providers.
Explore the latest tourism trends — medical, agro, eco, cultural, and gastro tourism.
Gain fresh ideas and inspiration through presentations, workshops, and live demonstrations.
Grow your business or career with new contacts and opportunities.

cards.title: Why exhibit?
description: Showcase your services internationally and reach a wide tourism audience in Central Asia.
Build strong partnerships with tour operators, investors, ministries, and industry leaders.
Attract new clients and expand your market by presenting your products and programs.
Strengthen your brand and credibility by being part of a major international event.
Access business and investment opportunities across tourism, education, healthcare, agriculture, and technology.
